text.verifytaken: This number is already in use by another account.

purchase.allPremiumFeatures: Get access to everything MTV Play has to offer!
purchase.didYouKnow: Did you know about all the other advantages of being an MTV Mobile customer? Check them out!
purchase.getMore: Unlock all the episodes and TV channels MTV Play has to offer!

description.fire: Get access to every episode of all our shows plus our TV Channels. And don’t worry, if you want to try this first. On Amazon devices your first month is completely for free.
description.tv: Get access to every episode of all our shows plus our TV Channels.

monthlyPass.body: By pressing continue you buy a monthly subscription for
monthlyPass.title: Premium (Month)

singlePass.body: By pressing continue you rent this episode for
singlePass.title: Unlock Episode

yearlyPass.body: By pressing continue you will buy an annual subscription for
yearlyPass.title: Premium (Year)

text.hoorayUpgradedText: Welcome to MTV Play Premium! Great to have you with us. If you have questions about the app, please check out our FAQ section. If this doesn't help, our support heroes over at helpme@mtvplay.tv have an answer for almost everything.
text.enterYourNumber: If you are an MTV Mobile customer, you can easily unlock all episodes and TV channels. Just choose your country and enter your phone number to begin.
text.verifyMobile: If you are an MTV Mobile customer, you can easily unlock all episodes and TV channels. Just choose your country and enter your phone number to begin.
text.verifyfail: That's not a valid MTV Mobile number.
text.easyRegister: Don’t worry, registering is easy. And we won't do anything dishonest with your data. Scout's honor!
text.noFavos: Favorite shows for instant and easy access.
text.watchBig: Just install the app on another device or go mtvplay.tv and sign in with the same account. This device will pop up here and you will be automatically connected. Now you can control the connected device and watch your videos on a big screen.
text.noDevices: There are two ways to connect to another device. You can simply start MTV Play on another device or visit mtvplay.tv and sign in with the same account. You can also start your Chromecast or Apple TV on the same network.

signup.title: Register
signup.already: Sorry, this e-mail is already taken!

invalid.password: Your password must contain at least six characters.
invalid.cellphone: Please check if your phone number is correct and that you chose the right country.

forgot.title: Forgot your Password?
forgot.success: We've sent you an email with a reset link.

text.name: Name
text.termsOfService: By registering you agree to our:
text.workingOnIt: We are working very hard to bring you your favorite MTV channels wherever you are.

tv.description: To connect your account to the TV, please enter the four digit code on your TV screen. If you don’t see the code, please navigate to the profile icon on the bottom of the menu.
tv.title: Connect to your TV

nl.text: We maken een onderscheid tussen functionele cookies en cookies voor het beheer van webstatistieken, advertenties en social media. MTV maakt gebruik van functionele en analytische cookies om inzicht te krijgen in de werking en effectiviteit van haar websites. De daarmee verzamelde gegevens worden niet gebruikt om activiteiten van individuele gebruikers te volgen. De advertentie en social media cookies van derden verzamelen mogelijk gegevens ook buiten de website(s) van MTV. Door hiernaast op akkoord te klikken of door gebruik te blijven maken van deze website, geef je toestemming voor het plaatsen van cookies bij bezoek aan de website(s) van MTV. Meer weten over deze cookies? Klik dan hiernaast op “meer informatie tonen”.
nl.title: MTV maakt gebruik van cookies.

cookieBar.text: This website uses cookies to enhance your user experience. By using our website, you consent to our use of cookies in accordance with the terms of the cookie policy.

text.countdown: Your video will play after this ad.
text.legalContainer: Our terms of use apply. By continuing you acknowledge and agree that you cannot withdraw your purchase once delivery has started.

login.tvSubtitle: To watch locked content, please download our mobile app. In the app you can register, login and upgrade to a premium account. Afterwards you will be able to connect to this TV and control it.

mailHelp.body: For the best possible support, please tell us the e-mail you're logged in with, the country you are in right now, the name of your device and the version of the app you're having issues with.
mailHelp.title: There's something you should know about MTV Play.

mailShare.body: Have you seen this yet? Check it out on MTV Play!
mailShare.title: There's something you need to check out on MTV Play.

register.description: To register or sign in, please visit [location of the login page] and enter the four digit code below.
register.title: Register/Sign in

text.mobileUpgradeInfo: Unfortunately you can't buy a Premium Pass on our website. But don't worry, that's what our mobile apps are for. Just pick up your iOS or Android device and get MTV Play from the store.
text.newAccount: Welcome! You can now sign in.
text.newsletterSubtitle: We will never send you spam!

notAvailable.text: Unfortunately MTV play is not yet available in your country. If you believe an error has been made please contact us at:
notAvailable.title: Thank you for your Interest.

settings.connectivityDescription: By default, MTV Play streams videos over Wi-Fi and mobile networks (3G/4G). Streaming over mobile networks might result in additional charges from your operator.

newsletter.body: We won't ever share your details with a third party.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.body: MTV Play is the best way to watch all your favorite MTV shows wherever you are.

devices.title: MTV Play is Everywhere!
devices.body: We have apps for Phones, Tablets, Smart TVs and your Browser so you can watch your shows anywhere!

connect.title: Connect Screens!
connect.body: Log in on two or more devices for a rich multiscreen experience.

free.body: Register or sign in to get started!

mobile.body: MTV Mobile customers get unlimited premium access to all content!

register.title: Register or sign in to start watching!
